# Security Policy

This repository is public for **portfolio and demonstration purposes**.  
Forking is permitted per GitHub policy, but the **original author retains all rights** to the code and materials.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you believe youâ€™ve found a security issue, please **do not open a public issue**.  
Instead, contact **Lawrence Freeman** directly via GitHub or LinkedIn.

## Responsible Use

This repository does **not contain production credentials or sensitive data**.  
Any reuse of content or code must follow the license terms.  
Use of automation workflows (GitHub Actions) should occur within secure, private environments.
